Package be.helha.api_recettapp.services

Class EvaluationService

java.lang.Object
be.helha.api_recettapp.services.EvaluationService
All Implemented Interfaces:
IEvaluationService
@Service public class EvaluationService extends Object implements IEvaluationService
Service class responsible for managing evaluations. Implements the IEvaluationService interface to provide the core logic for adding, deleting, and retrieving evaluations.

    • deleteEvaluation

      public void deleteEvaluation(Long id, boolean isAdmin)
      Deletes an evaluation by its ID. This action is restricted to administrators.
      Specified by:
      deleteEvaluation in interface IEvaluationService
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the evaluation to delete.
      isAdmin - A flag indicating whether the user is an administrator.
      Throws:
      SecurityException - if the user is not an administrator.
